source_description: F078 Plan Snapshots & Amendments - Plan versioning and amendment logging for mid-production changes. When production starts, capture complete plan state as JSON snapshot (recipes, FGs, quantities, batch decisions). Support 3 amendment types: DROP_FG, ADD_FG, MODIFY_BATCH with required reason capture. Append-only amendment log. UI to show amendment history, add amendments, and compare original vs current plan.
